"use client" import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { MapPin, Clock, RouteIcon, DollarSign, Target, Calendar } from "lucide-react" import { Card } from "../components/ui/card" import { Tabs } from "../components/ui/tabs" import axios from 'axios'; // Import the components we'll create next import CampaignMap from "../components/CampaignMap" import RouteTimeline from "../components/RouteTimeline" import BudgetBreakdown from "../components/BudgetBreakdown" export default function CampaignResults() { const [campaignData, setCampaignData] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchCampaignData = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:8080/api/chat/generateRoute'); setCampaignData(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching campaign data:', error); } }; fetchCampaignData(); }, []); if (!campaignData) { return
Loading...
; } return (

Optimized mobile billboard campaign for {campaignData.businessName}

{/* Campaign Overview Card */}

Campaign Overview

{campaignData.businessType}
Target Audience

{campaignData.campaignType}
Campaign Details
{campaignData.location}
{campaignData.duration}
â‚¹{campaignData.budget}
{/* Main Content Tabs */}
{/* Locations Section */}

Recommended Locations in Pune

High-traffic areas where your target audience (18-40) is most likely to be present

{campaignData.locations.map((location, index) => (

{location.name}

{location.description}

))}
{/* Timing Section */}

Optimal Timing for Maximum Visibility

Strategic time slots to reach your target audience throughout the day

{campaignData.timings.map((timing, index) => (

{timing.time}

{timing.description}

))}

Daily Visibility Heatmap

{campaignData.visibilityHeatmap.map((item, index) => (
{item.time} {item.visibility}% Visibility
))}
{/* Route Plan Section */}

7-Day Route Plan

Optimized route to maximize visibility while staying within budget

Days 1-3: Morning to Midday Focus

Days 4-5: Midday to Evening Focus

Days 6-7: Evening to Late Night Focus
) }
